## {{< fa bullseye >}} Learning Objectives


::: {.cell}

:::


1. Learners can apply ten functions from the dplyr R Package to generate a subset of data for use in a table or plot.
1. Learners can use functions of the gt R package to present summary tables in output formats.

## {{< fa book >}} Readings

2. Read [Excuse Me, Do You Have a Moment to Talk About Version Control?](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/00031305.2017.1399928)
